definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Give them some money to take their younger siblings out for ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 給他們些零花錢，讓他帶着他的弟妹們去買些冷飲。

sentences.english: I used to spend all my pocket money on clothes and snacks.
sentences.chinese: 我過去常把我所有的零花錢花在衣服和零食上。

sentences.english: We can present them our pocketmoney and clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以捐出零花錢和衣服。

sentences.english: He used to spend most of his pocket money playing computer games.
sentences.chinese: 過去零花錢常常花在打電腦遊戲上。

sentences.english: Do not forget to give yourself an allowance for things you enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘了給你自己一些零花錢去好好享受。

sentences.english: His mother insisted that his pock money would not exceed 100 every month .
sentences.chinese: 他媽媽堅持說他每一個月零花錢不能超過100元。

sentences.english: Require your kids to give part of a weekly allowance to needy children.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的孩子將每週零花錢的一部分給那些貧困的孩子。

sentences.english: He will try to sweet-talk his wife into increasing his pocket money tonight.
sentences.chinese: 他今晚要試試說些好話讓他老婆多給他些零花錢。

sentences.english: And a good way to get some pocket money.
sentences.chinese: 同時也是掙點零花錢的好方法。

sentences.english: I used to spend all my  pocket money.
sentences.chinese: 我過去常花光所有的零花錢。

sentences.english: Before I escape, I gave the allowance my mother gave me to the old lady.
sentences.chinese: 逃離之時，我把媽媽早上給的零花錢轉贈給老人家。

sentences.english: Itake pocket money from myself, because I am working.
sentences.chinese: 我自己給自己零花錢，因爲我已經工作啦。

sentences.english: The children cling to their father for more pocket money.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們黏着爸爸，要他再給此零花錢。

sentences.english: The child is wasteful with money, so I am going to cut his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子太愛亂花錢，這月要節減他的零花錢。
那要花掉我們所有的零花錢。

definition: money given to children as new year present
to lose money instead of being paid (i.e. sb should pay me, but is actually taking my money)
to support a family/to raise a family
to live one's life/to make a living
